text: Finding the average of a list

This is my code so far

code:
l = [15, 18, 2, 36, 12, 78, 5, 6, 9]
print reduce(lambda x, y: x + y, l)

text: I've got it so it adds together the values in the list, but I don't know how to make it divide into them?
